channel.title: B0unty Sc4pe development team
channel.description:
[center][b][size=17pt]What I'm Doing[/size][/b]
I'm working on making a server called bountyscape..Its been updated several times..About 4 hours a day I put in. And i'm trying to work on getting it updated alot more! [hr]
Programming and Hosting
What We're Aiming for
-Every or almost all skills working -Full specials -NPC training -Lots of shops -Much more will be added shortly... -Godswords.. (easy, im just to lasy) -a alltome command -Alot more... [hr]
-Website-
I'm making a forum. and website. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ How to sign up ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Quote IRL Name: Age: Experience: Job Wanted: How long have you been programming with java: Msn or Yahoo: Why: Forum And In Game Name:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Jobs Available ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Programming/ Coding: (Same thing - Four Spaces)
-hello sara - - -
Client Programming : (Three) - - -
Quests: (2 left) - -
Webclient Work: (Three spaces left) - - -
InGame Mods: (5 open) - - - - - Forum Mods: (4 left) - - - -
Handlers & Skills: (1) -
Forums & Website: (9) - - - - - - - - -
Thanks - B0unty Sc4pe Development team [/center]

item.description:
@killerkid003 wrote:

Hello

IRL Name: Joey Baker

Age: 15

Experience: i would say 7 or 8 with java and a 9 or 10 with html

Job Wanted: ether the website or the coding (I’m better at websites but faster at coding)

How long have you been programming with java: I’ve been working on java or about 2 years now

Msn or Yahoo: joeybaker5000@ Yahoo.com or hotmail.com ether 1

Why: To help out with the server and to help get me better at coding this type of things

Forum And In Game Name: Killerkid003

P.S. I am realy good with shops and what you need to do with the shop to get it to open
-My server in most shops you have to be a mem and have at least player-Rights or 1+
-You also have to have certain levels to get into my crafting, magic, and fletching shops
